SELECT tt.* , tdt.ko_name as tripDestinationKoName, tdt.img FROM trip_tb tt left outer join trip_destination_tb tdt on(tdt.trip_destination_id = tt.trip_destination_id) where tt.user_id = #{userId} and (tt.start_date >= now() or (now() >= tt.start_date and tt.end_date >= now())) order by CASE WHEN NOW() >= tt.start_date AND tt.end_date >= NOW() THEN 0 WHEN tt.start_date >= NOW() THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, tt.start_date ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.album_id, a.trip_id, p.* FROM ( -- 최근 앨범 3개 추출 (trip_id 기반) SELECT album_id, trip_id FROM ( SELECT album_id, trip_id FROM album_tb WHERE trip_id = ( -- 가장 최근 사진의 trip_id 구하기 SELECT trip_id FROM album_tb WHERE album_id = ( SELECT p.album_id FROM photo_tb p JOIN album_tb a ON p.album_id = a.album_id WHERE a.user_id = 5 ORDER BY p.photo_id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) ORDER BY album_id DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS recent_album ) a LEFT JOIN ( -- 각 앨범의 가장 최근 사진을 구하기 SELECT p1.album_id, p1.photo_url FROM photo_tb p1 JOIN ( SELECT album_id, MAX(photo_id) AS max_photo_id FROM photo_tb GROUP BY album_id ) p2 ON p1.album_id = p2.album_id AND p1.photo_id = p2.max_photo_id ) p ON a.album_id = p.album_id;

SELECT tdt.* FROM trip_tb tt left outer join trip_destination_tb tdt on(tdt.trip_destination_id = tt.trip_destination_id) where tdt.ko_name like "대한민국%" GROUP BY tdt.trip_destination_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC limit 3;

SELECT tdt.* FROM trip_tb tt left outer join trip_destination_tb tdt on(tdt.trip_destination_id = tt.trip_destination_id) where tdt.ko_name not like "대한민국%" GROUP BY tdt.trip_destination_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC limit 3;
